fields.title: Explore
fields.content_ru:
Узнать, узнать, узнать...!!

Effective Learining Courses were created especially for IT sphere Everything that you need in your daily work! Be effective using easy and convinient tools for learning Pictures that describing all things that are useful

 

Learn from the comfort of your Home

We do understand that having a comfortable place to learn is as vital as the subject itself. The right place with the right tools, and half the job is done. And what's more comfortable than your home? And what's better tool than your very own laptop?

We assure you learning English online is not only more convenient, but because it is so convenient, is also the smartest and the most effective way of learning for the IT specialists.

 

 

The right to choose.!!

While “immersion” is a very important aspect for learning a language, but time and time again we have seen IT professionals ending up learning about ‘elephants’ and ‘oranges’. Here at english-i, we give you the wand to choose what you want to study and learn and not what you don't really need.

Choose from our list of pre-prepared courses whatsoever suits your needs, and if it doesn't, you may well create your OWN course.

 
GET STARTED
fields.content:
HOW IT WORKS

 

It's simple and fast.

First, you create an account and choose a course of your linking or create your own course. Second, you pay for the entire course or just the first month. Third, we contact you within the next 24 hours to get the information required by your instructor and we settle a perfect time for you. Lastly you start your learning.

 

 

 

JUST DO IT.

 

 

We strongly believe that the best way to learn English is to use it.

The new intuitive and refurbished way of studying English has been crafted by the professionals having an in-depth knowledge of your work and sphere. All you have to do is

JUST DO IT.

fields.title: Team
fields.content:
Rohan Nim
Managing Director / Instructor / Teacher
Managing Director
Instructor
Teacher
Steve Jobs once said "Do what you love to do". Although I got my B.Tech degree in Chemical Engineering, I never loved it. So I kept looking, until I tried teaching, and that was it. I immediately fell in love with it. Studying in a British School from the very childhood, English has always been my primary language, but engineering helped me make an instant connection to IT professionals. And like an old wine, teaching experience in some major IT companies made me better and better. I hope to continue to do what I love to do, here at English-i.
 
 
Rohan Nim

fields.content:
TERMS AND CONDITIONS

 

  1. All study materials provided to the clients are the sole properties of “English-i.com” and are for their own personal use only. Unauthorised use, publications and redistribution is subjected to legal actions.

  2. Client can cancel a session by the student before 24 hours from the scheduled start of the lesson by sending us an email with the subject “Cancellation” followed by further details.

  3. In case the client fails to inform before the above mentioned timeframe, a penalty of half a session would be charged off the client’s balance.

  4. In case the teacher fails to meet the client at the scheduled time, English-i takes full responsibility. An appropriate compensation could be provided to the customer on his following payment.

  5. Client is advised to have the session in a quiet and comfortable place with no source of distraction and noise. He/She is also advised to always check the quality of his internet connection. We recommend to have at least 30MB/sec connection dedicated to the session.

  6. Clients must have a google account. “Google Drive” is an important tool we will use for our mutual purposes.

  7. In case, the course could not be completed on due time, the student would have to pay 30% of the original fee for the following lessons. Please note, that some students are slower and some are faster than others. We take full responsibility of the quality of education we provide and therefore we can’t expedite the course for slower students.

  8. For faster learning students, if they finish the course before the due time, we will provide a full refund across their balance. However, if they wish, they may use the amount on future courses.

  9. Please provide us a maximum of one week time in case you require a change of teacher or schedule .
fields.content_en:
TERMS AND CONDITIONS

 

  1. All study materials provided to the clients are the sole properties of “English-i.com” and are for their own personal use only. Unauthorised use, publications and redistribution is subjected to legal actions.

  2. Client can cancel a session by the student before 24 hours from the scheduled start of the lesson by sending us an email with the subject “Cancellation” followed by further details.

  3. In case the client fails to inform before the above mentioned timeframe, a penalty of half a session would be charged off the client’s balance.

  4. In case the teacher fails to meet the client at the scheduled time, English-i takes full responsibility. An appropriate compensation could be provided to the customer on his following payment.

  5. Client is advised to have the session in a quiet and comfortable place with no source of distraction and noise. He/She is also advised to always check the quality of his internet connection. We recommend to have at least 30MB/sec connection dedicated to the session.

  6. Clients must have a google account. “Google Drive” is an important tool we will use for our mutual purposes.

  7. In case, the course could not be completed on due time, the student would have to pay 30% of the original fee for the following lessons. Please note, that some students are slower and some are faster than others. We take full responsibility of the quality of education we provide and therefore we can’t expedite the course for slower students.

  8. For faster learning students, if they finish the course before the due time, we will provide a full refund across their balance. However, if they wish, they may use the amount on future courses.

  9. Please provide us a maximum of one week time in case you require a change of teacher or schedule .

fields.title: Courses
fields.content_ru: Курсы - это прекрасно, чем больше курсов - тем лучше! Мы любим курсы.

fields.title: Create your own course
fields.content_ru: выберите курс, который вам подходит. Если не знаете, что вам надо, поставьте галочку "Связаться с нами" и мы все разрулим.
fields.content:
Please choose the skills you need. A minimum selection of two skills is required to create your own course.

if you're not sure, you may select "Leave it to us" and we will analyse your needs after contacting you personally.
fields.content_en:
Please choose the skills you need. A minimum selection of two skills is required to create your own course.

if you're not sure, you may select "Leave it to us" and we will analyse your needs after contacting you personally.

fields.title: Create course help
fields.content_ru: Ваш запрос отправлен, в течении трех часов с вами свяжутся.
